article: Mr. White looks out of the window. There is a little boy on the other side of the street. The boy  takes  a piece of bread out of a bag and begins to eat it. There is a very thin dog  _  the street, too. The boy says to it, "Come on. I'm going to give you  _  bread." The dog is very hungry and goes to him. But the boy  _  give it any bread. He kicks  _  god. It runs away, and the boy laughs. Then Mr. White comes out of  _  home and says to the boy, "I'm going to give you a shilling ." The boy is  _  and says, "Good." "Come here!" Mr. White says. The boy goes to him,  _  Mr. White doesn't give him a shilling. He hits him  _  his stick . The boy  cries  and says, "Why do you hit me? I don't ask you for any money." Mr. White says, "you know the god doesn't ask you for any bread, but you kick it."
